prompt.title: Join?
prompt.message_one: There is already an ongoing session for the document %s startet by user %s %s ago. Would you like to join?
prompt.message_select: There are multiple session runnning for the document %s. Would you like to join one?

office.close_edit_file: Did you save the document or would you like to close this window without saving the document?

startup_prompt.title: Information
startup_prompt.message:
This app is an integration of the office suite Libre Office with collaboration features. You can open and edit text, spreadsheet and presentation documents. Multiple user can open and edit a shared document at the same time.
This app is currently Beta stage if you encounter any problems please try again later or download the document and open it locally.
